apalāyin：a. [a-palāyin] 逃亡せざる，勇敢なる.

Apalāyin，（adj.） [a + palāyin] not running away，steadfast，brave，fearless Nd<sup>2</sup> 13 （abhīru anutrāsin apalāyin as expl<sup>n.</sup> of acchambhin and vīra）； J.IV，296； V，4 （where C. gives variant “apalāpinī ti pi pāṭho”，which latter has v. l. apalāsinī & is expl<sup>d.</sup> by C. as palāpa-rahite anavajjasarīre p. 5）. See also apalāsin. （Page 52）
